name: Rudy Gasson
body:
# Just another GitHub Blog

I am still not sure how to manage this site, but I'll find out.

This is an automatically generated page, directly written on Github. Unfortunately there seems to be no way to combine this with a local Jekyll installation to get best of both worlds (and the layouts).


***


```bash
$git init tech blog
I hope this looks like code.
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
